thread.title: The Chase Comes to Talladega This Weekend
thread.title_full: The Chase Comes to Talladega This Weekend

author: Jeanette Torres
title: The Chase Comes to Talladega This Weekend
text:
Share Article 
Sean Gardner/Getty Images (LINCOLN, Ala.) -- The final race in the "Contender Round" of the Sprint Cup Series' Chase will be held at Talladega Superspeedway this Sunday.The track will host the CampingWorld.com 500 at Talladega. NBC Sports Network's coverage of the race will begin at 2:30 p.m. Eastern time.Eight of the 12 remaining drivers in the Chase will advance to the "Eliminator Round." Joey Logano is guaranteed a spot after winning the past two races.Here's a look at the Chase standings entering this weekend's action:1. Joey Logano -- 3,095 points.2. Denny Hamlin -- 3,082 points.3. Kurt Busch -- 3,077 points.4. Carl Edwards -- 3,076 points.5. Kevin Harvick -- 3,071 points.6. Jeff Gordon -- 3,071 points.7. Brad Keselowski -- 3,071 points.8. Martin Truex Jr. -- 3,070 points.9. Kyle Busch -- 3,064 points.10. Ryan Newman -- 3,062 points.11. Dale Earnhardt Jr. -- 3,039 points.12. Matt Kenseth -- 3,035 points.13. Jamie McMurray -- 2,154 points.14. Jimmie Johnson -- 2,134 points.15. Paul Menard -- 2,109 points.16. Clint Bowyer -- 2,086 points.
